metadata.subject: Louis XVI, King of France, 1754-1793
Monarchy
metadata.title: Opinion de Michel Azéma, député du département de l'Aude, membre du Comité de législation et de la section chargée de la faction du code français par l'Assemblée nationale législative, et membre du même Comité de la Convention nationale : sur le jugement de Louis Capet, dernier roi des Français
metadata.creator: Azéma, Michel, 1752-1827
Azéma, Michel, 1752-1827
France. Convention nationale
Louis XVI Trial and Execution Collection (Newberry Library) ICN
metadata.description: At head of caption: Convention nationale
Forms part of the Louis XVI Trial and Execution Collection at the Newberry Library
Uncut and loose-bound in v. 9 of a collection of pamphlets in contemporary cartonnage bindings, with pink pastepaper over boards and blue paper spine labels
metadata.notes: Title page located on front cover. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Worn, damaged and discolored pages and cover. Skewed text. Uneven binding.
